capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are a bit of an iconic part of her character. I mean, who can forget those round spectacles? They're just so... her. And yeah, they do make her look pretty sharp, even if she is a Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just reading about Minerva McGonagall and it's clear that she's an adult, you know? She's a highly respected witch and the Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts. I'm pretty sure of it, I mean, I've seen her in action and she's always so composed and confident.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never met an adult before, this is really interesting!
